mapper.select: select order_id, order_no, order_state, order_time, userid, order_payment, order_money, order_paynumber,order_waybill,order_adress from myone.wph_order where order_id = #{orderid}
mapper.insert: insert into myone.wph_order(order_no, order_state, order_time, userid, order_payment, order_money,order_adress ) values (#{orderNo}, #{orderState}, #{orderTime}, #{userId}, #{orderPayment}, #{orderMoney},#{orderadress})
mapper.select: select order_id, order_no, order_state, order_time, userid, order_payment, order_money, order_paynumber,order_waybill,order_adress from wph_order where order_state=2 or order_state=3
mapper.update: update wph_order set order_state=2,order_waybill=#{orderwaybill} where order_state=3 and userid=#{userid} and order_id=#{orderid}
